entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 13.
